resources.string: Pick apps to show in the launcher\'s apps grid
Coffee Table is a simple launcher which aims to supply minimum number of features, be lightweight, customize shown apps and optimize to e-reader (namely, Nook).
This is an open-source project. Read more at https://github.com/menny/coffeetable
